name: PairTools
description:
This is yet another auto-closing pair tools. All configurations are handled per filetype using a 'filetype'.vim file inside the user ftplugin directory.

See the accompanying help file for more details and examples.
install_details: Simply drop pairtools.vim inside the user plugin directory and pairtools.txt into the user doc directory. Then use helptags to install pairtools as a help file.
